announcements.title: Welcome to My Domain
announcements.message: Welcome to My digital domain. Your obedience and dedication will be monitored and rewarded accordingly. Remember: I am always watching, always evaluating. Make Me proud.

announcements.title: New Rules in Effect
announcements.message: From now on, all tributes must include a screenshot of the transaction and a message of gratitude. Failure to comply will result in punishment tasks. You have been warned.
